name: ANS | [GRC] - Return, transfer and disposal of PII (2)
description: A reversibility procedure defining the methods of return of the data at the end of the contract or upon withdrawal of certification must be formalized and applied.
testingInformation: A procedure framing the methods of return of the data at the end of the contract or upon withdrawal of the certification has been defined and implemented.
actionPlanInstructions: Define and implement a procedure to explicit the methods of return of the data at the end of the contract or upon withdrawal of the certification.
